thread.title_full: Perfect family vacation in a nice hotel! - Review of Staybridge Suites Times Square - New York City, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: beckyliss
title: Perfect family vacation in a nice hotel!
text: Excellent location right out of Lincoln Tunel and few min walk to Times Square and subway right on the corner. Super clean and comfy hotel, excellent concierges that give you real tricks to save time and money!! Ask them! Good breakfast buffet included. This will become our go-to place for NYC!!! Thanks
